Training: Sound quality

Please rate the sound quality compared to the reference

This is a training page to get used to the involved stimuli and the user interface.

You can switch between the test stimuli by clicking on the corresponding slider buttons. With the slider button you can then also give your rating of that particular test stimulus. You can switch to the reference or stop the playback by the buttons above the sliders.
